name: Stripe PHP iDEAL example
description: Example Stripe iDEAL integration with PHP backend

STRIPE_TEST_PUBLISHABLE_KEY.description: Stripe test publishable key -- find this at https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys (it'll look like pk_test_****)

STRIPE_TEST_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe test secret key -- find this at https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys (it'll look like sk_test_****)
